summary: A bounty hunter with a pregnant wife who is urging him to get a regular job gets framed for murder and trapped in a war between Russian gangsters.
cast: Michael Dudikoff|Ardon Bess|Michelle Johnson|Billy Dee Williams|Tom Harvey|Noam Jenkins|Len Doncheff|Patrick Gallagher|Peter Boretski|Michael Bernardo|Robert Thomas|Tig Fong|Lauro David Chartrand-DelValle|Tom Melissis|Shannon Klassen|Patrick Ezerzer|Josette Garoufallis|Vida Asante|Robert Chang|Teresa Wiwchar|Damian Lee
title: En zona de peligro
